Posts.Content: jumbledbamboo wrote: With the other chemo I expected chemo. I was having TCHP. Now after my first Herceptin only I have all over body aches still. I also had a migraine for the second time during chemo. I have headaches and migraines a lot from my stroke but this was bad ebough I wanted to go to the er. I held out. I still am in all over pain. Anyone else have this from only Herceptin? Thank you Amber Dawn Dx 2/17/2015, DCIS/IDC: Medullary, Right, 3cm, Stage IIB, Grade 2, 0/17 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Surgery 2/23/2015 Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel; Mastectomy: Right; Prophylactic ovary removal; Reconstruction (right) Chemotherapy 3/30/2015 Carboplatin (Paraplatin), Taxotere (docetaxel) Chemotherapy 3/31/2015 Targeted Therapy 8/3/2015 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Surgery 9/4/2015 Prophylactic ovary removal Targeted Therapy Perjeta (pertuzumab) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Herceptin and pain jumbledbamboo lindaontario
